title: nebo
example_4: Declension: sing. (nebo, neba, nebu, nebo, nebom, nebu), pl. (nebesa, nebesa, nebesima, nebesa, nebesima, nebesima).

title: luka

title: biti
meaning_4: Conjugation: present (sam, si, je, smo, ste, su), past (bio, bila, bilo).

title: boja

title: ekran
